metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9234 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In wpa_supplicant_8, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122465453

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE was assigned to Android, impact on Ubuntu is unknown No equivalent fix in upstream wpa source as of 2022-02-03 Likely android-specific, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
